name.description: The resource name. For Review it is of the form accounts/{accountId}/locations/{locationId}/reviews/{reviewId}

profilePhotoUrl.description: The profile photo link of the reviewer. Only populated if isAnonymous is false.

displayName.description: The name of the reviewer. Only populated with the reviewer's real name if isAnonymous is false.

isAnonymous.description: Indicates whether the reviewer has opted to remain anonymous.

starRating.description: The star rating of the review.

comment.description: The body of the review as plain text with markups.

createTime.description: The timestamp for when the review was written. A timestamp in RFC3339 UTC 'Zulu' format.

updateTime.description: The timestamp for when the review was last modified. A timestamp in RFC3339 UTC 'Zulu' format.

comment.description: The body of the reply as plain text with markups. The maximum length is 4096 bytes.

updateTime.description: The timestamp for when the reply was last modified. A timestamp in RFC3339 UTC 'Zulu' format.

averageRating.description: The average star rating of all reviews for this location on a scale of 1 to 5, where 5 is the highest rating.

totalReviewCount.description: The total number of reviews for this location.

nextPageToken.description: If the number of reviews exceeded the requested page size, this field is populated with a token to fetch the next page of reviews on a subsequent call to reviews.list. If there are no more reviews, this field is not present in the response.
